para.emph: Engine will not crank when attempting to start

item.para: Battery discharged or faulty - Check that the cable ends are clean and tight on the battery posts and engine.
Broken or disconnected wire - Check that the wire #12 (signal wire) is secure and clean on the starter solenoid and the engine to chassis ground strap is secure and clean.
Faulty starter relay - Check relay #1 for proper operation.
Faulty starter - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Engine seized- see Engine Service Manual S12020.

para.emph: Engine cranks but will not start

item.para: Lack of fuel - Inspect the fuel bowl to ensure it is full of fuel.
Faulty low-pressure fuel pump - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Water in fuel system - Remove fuel bowl, drain and replace fuel filter.
Blown glow plug fuse - Replace 30A fuse
Faulty glow plug(s) - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Faulty glow plug relay - Check relay #2 for proper operation.
Faulty fuel run solenoid relay - Check relay # 3 for proper operation.
Blown fuel run solenoid fuse - Check 30A fuse marked SOLENOID.
Faulty fuel run solenoid - Check that the harness connection is clean and properly connected and that the solenoid is adjusted properly.
Clogged / dirty air cleaner - Replace air filter, reset maintenance counter.
Clogged / dirty fuel filter - Replace fuel filter.
Air in fuel system - Bleed fuel system, inspect complete fuel system for leaks.
Wrong engine oil (for ambient temperature) - Change oil and filter, reset maintenance counter.
Broken valve spring, stuck valve, improper valve timing - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Worn fuel camshaft, incorrect injection timing - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Faulty injection pump, clogged injectors - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Compression leak, worn piston ring - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Air in fuel system - Bleed fuel system, and inspect complete fuel system for leaks (ensure fuel in tanks is sufficient).
Clogged / dirty air cleaner - Replace engine air filter, reset maintenance counter.
Clogged / dirty fuel filter - Replace fuel filter.
Faulty fuel run solenoid - Replace run solenoid, see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Clogged injector nozzle - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Governor defective / worn - see Engine Service Manual S12020.

para.emph: Black or dark grey exhaust gas from engine

item.para: Excessive engine oil - Reduce to specified level.
Clogged / dirty air cleaner - Replace engine air filter, reset maintenance counter.
Clogged / dirty fuel filter - Replace fuel filter.
Worn or stuck piston ring - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Incorrect injection timing - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Poor engine compression - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Worn or stuck oil ring - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Worn piston ring groove - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Worn valve stem and guide - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Worn crankshaft bearing and crank pin - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Worn injection pump plunger - see Engine Service Manual S12020.
Clogged / dirty fuel filter - Replace fuel filter.
Clogged / dirty air filter - Replace air filter, reset maintenance counter.
Low oil pressure / oil pressure switch - Test / replace.
